long_description: The powerful Olympus 10 x 21 RCII WP binoculars pack waterproof performance into a lightweight and compact design. When folded, these binoculars slip easily into a pocket. Rugged, waterproof binoculars can be submerged at 1m for up to 5 min. Roof prisms and multicoated lenses produce bright, clear images. Center focus knob quickly brings subject into sharp focus; corrective diopter adjusts to each user's eyesight. The Olympus 10 x 21 RCII WP binoculars feature long eye relief to accommodate use with eyeglasses.
short_description: The powerful Olympus 10 x 21 RCII WP binoculars pack waterproof performance into a lightweight and compact design. When folded, these binoculars slip easily into a pocket.
